member.name: GROUP_SOURCE_REQ
member.summary: The GROUP_SOURCE_REQ structure provides multicast group information for IPv6 or IPv4 addresses that includes the source IP address.

member.name: GROUP_SOURCE_REQ.gsr_interface
member.summary: The interface index of the local interface on which the multicast group should be joined, dropped, blocked, or unblocked.

member.name: GROUP_SOURCE_REQ.gsr_group
member.summary: The address of the multicast group. This may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 multicast address.

member.name: GROUP_SOURCE_REQ.gsr_source
member.summary: The source address that should be used. This may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 multicast address, but it must be the same address family (IPv6 or IPv4) as the address specified in the gsr_group member.
